input.sentences: we had a great time at the graduation ceremony last year .
the stands were full of friends and family .
all of the staff were very proud of us .
output.sentences: The students can't believe that graduation day is here.
All the students and friends have worked hard for this moment.
Families gather to commemorate this special day.
The professors and mentors are proud of each student.
They did it, time to celebrate!
